com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.factory

Interface CheckSettingsBuilderFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckSettingsBuilderFactoryImpl

    public interface CheckSettingsBuilderFactory
    A factory for creating CheckSettingsBuilders. CheckSettings are used to specify which types of flags should be shown in report.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CheckSettingsBuilder copy(CheckSettings checkSettings)
      Copies CheckSettings.
      CheckSettingsBuilder create(Language lang, RuleSet ruleSet)
      Creates a new CheckSettingsBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        CheckSettingsBuilder create(Language lang,
                          RuleSet ruleSet)
        Creates a new CheckSettingsBuilder. CheckSettings are used to specify which types of flags should be shown in report.
        Parameters:
        lang - The checking Language.
        Note: The ServerCapabilities.getLanguageCapabilities() have to support this Language.
        ruleSet - The RuleSet used for the check.
        Note: The LanguageCapabilities.getRuleSetCapabilities() have to support this RuleSet.
        Returns:
        A new CheckSettingsBuilder with specified Language and RuleSet.

      • copy

        CheckSettingsBuilder copy(CheckSettings checkSettings)
        Copies CheckSettings.
        Parameters:
        checkSettings - CheckSettings to copy.
        Returns:
        A new CheckSettingsBuilder initialized by CheckSettings.
